autoReader.title: Auto reader mode
autoReader.description: Whether to automatically apply the last-used reader theme at launch.

dyanamicTheme.title: Dynamic theme
dyanamicTheme.description: Whether to save separate last-used preferences for OS light/dark themes.

filterCSS.title: Filter mode CSS
filterCSS.description: CSS property value to use for the Filter mode. Accepted filters: 'brightness', 'contrast', 'grayscale', 'hue-rotate', 'invert', 'saturate', and 'sepia'.
